verses.text: Behold, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w time|strong="G5154"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w In|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* \w shall|strong="G1417"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* told \w before|strong="G1519"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* foretell, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w present|strong="G3568"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w sinned|strong="G4258"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w rest|strong="G3062"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w will|strong="G3956"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w spare|strong="G5339"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G3756"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* speaketh \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* towards \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1414"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w although|strong="G5210"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2316"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w weakness|strong="G0769"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* liveth \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* towards \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

Try \w your|strong="G1487"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* selves \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; prove ye \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*. \w Know|strong="G1921"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w your|strong="G1487"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* selves, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w unless|strong="G1487"\w* \w perhaps|strong="G3385"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* reprobates?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* shall \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* reprobates.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w pray|strong="G2172"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w appear|strong="G5316"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* reprobates.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1410"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w do|strong="G1410"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w strong|strong="G1415"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w pray|strong="G2172"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w*, \w your|strong="G2532"\w* perfection.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, being \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w*, being \w present|strong="G3778"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* deal \w more|strong="G2596"\w* \w severely|strong="G0664"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* unto \w destruction|strong="G2506"\w*.

\w For|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rest|strong="G1510"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w*, take exhortation, \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w mind|strong="G5426"\w*, \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

Salute \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*. \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* salute \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* charity \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* communication \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. Amen.
